docs.lead_paragraph: The State Health Department, in a random survey, has found general obsolescence an staff shortages in 18 small voluntary hospitals here, but the report said the situation was not so bad as in the municipal hospitals.

headline.main: State Agency Criticizes Methods At 18 Voluntary Hospitals Here

docs.abstract: NYS Health Dept, in random survey, finds gen obsolescence and staff shortages in 18 small voluntary hosps; finds situation not so bad as in munic hosps; scores physical conditions; instances cited
docs.snippet: The State Health Department, in a random survey, has found general obsolescence an staff shortages in 18 small voluntary hospitals here, but the report said the situation was not so bad as in the municipal hospitals.
